targets.expr:
sum by (name) ((d8_virtualization_virtualmachine_status_phase{namespace="$namespace", name="$name"} == 1) * on(phase) group_left()
    (
      label_replace(vector(1), "phase", "Degraded", "", "") or
      label_replace(vector(2), "phase", "Migrating", "", "") or
      label_replace(vector(3), "phase", "Pause", "", "") or
      label_replace(vector(4), "phase", "Pending", "", "") or
      label_replace(vector(5), "phase", "Running", "", "") or
      label_replace(vector(6), "phase", "Starting", "", "") or
      label_replace(vector(7), "phase", "Stopped", "", "") or
      label_replace(vector(8), "phase", "Stopping", "", "") or
      label_replace(vector(9), "phase", "Terminating", "", "")
    ))

panels.description: The node on which the VM is currently running
panels.title: Node name

panels.description: Instance CPU core count
panels.title: CPU Cores

targets.expr:
sum by (namespace,name) (rate(d8_virtualization_virtualmachine_cpu_usage_milliseconds_total{namespace="$namespace", name="$name"}[$__rate_interval])) / 1000 
/
(
    sum by (namespace,name) (d8_virtualization_virtualmachine_cpu_cores{namespace="$namespace", name="$name"}) / 100
)

panels.description: Instance memory
panels.title: Memory

panels.description: This graph displays the total disk usage across all disks in the system as a percentage. It aggregates data from every filesystem, summing up used space and total capacity to provide an overall view of disk utilization. The calculation excludes temporary or cloud-init files to ensure accuracy.

targets.expr:
sum by (name, namespace) (
  d8_virtualization_virtualmachine_filesystem_used_bytes{namespace="$namespace", name="$name", type!="cloudinit"})
/ 
sum by (name, namespace) (d8_virtualization_virtualmachine_filesystem_capacity_bytes / 100)

panels.title: Total disks usage

panels.description: Whether the desired configuration is currently applied to a running VM
panels.title: Configuration

targets.expr:
sum by (namespace,name) (rate(d8_virtualization_virtualmachine_cpu_usage_milliseconds_total{namespace="$namespace", name="$name"}[$__rate_interval])) / 1000 
/
(
    sum by (namespace,name) (d8_virtualization_virtualmachine_cpu_cores{namespace="$namespace", name="$name"}) / 100
)

(
    sum by (namespace,name) (rate(d8_virtualization_virtualmachine_hypervisor_cpu_usage_milliseconds_total{namespace="$namespace", name="$name"}[$__rate_interval])) / 1000 
)
/
(
    sum by (namespace,name) (d8_virtualization_virtualmachine_cpu_cores{namespace="$namespace", name="$name"}) / 100
)

(
    sum by (namespace,name) ((d8_virtualization_virtualmachine_cpu_cores{namespace="$namespace", name="$name"} * d8_virtualization_virtualmachine_cpu_core_fraction) / 100)
)
/
(
    sum by (namespace,name) (d8_virtualization_virtualmachine_cpu_cores{namespace="$namespace", name="$name"}) / 100
)

panels.description: Disk read I/O operations
panels.title: Disk read IOPS

panels.description: Whether the desired configuration is currently applied to a running VM
panels.title: Configuration

panels.description: Timeline with information on VM statuses

targets.expr:
sum by (name) ((d8_virtualization_virtualmachine_status_phase{namespace="$namespace", name="$name"} == 1) * on(phase) group_left()
    (
      label_replace(vector(1), "phase", "Degraded", "", "") or
      label_replace(vector(2), "phase", "Migrating", "", "") or
      label_replace(vector(3), "phase", "Pause", "", "") or
      label_replace(vector(4), "phase", "Pending", "", "") or
      label_replace(vector(5), "phase", "Running", "", "") or
      label_replace(vector(6), "phase", "Starting", "", "") or
      label_replace(vector(7), "phase", "Stopped", "", "") or
      label_replace(vector(8), "phase", "Stopping", "", "") or
      label_replace(vector(9), "phase", "Terminating", "", "")
    ))

panels.title: VM status timeline

panels.description:
`Current cores` - The amount of computing resources allocated to the virtual machine.

`Guaranteed cores` - The minimum amount of resources (in fractions of CPUs) guaranteed to be available to the VM. Calculated as `Current cores` × `Reservation`

`Hypervisor overhead` - The value of the fraction of CPU used by the hypervisor.

`OS Usage` - The level of utilization of allocated compute resources of the guest OS. If `Reservation < 100%`, it is allowed to exceed `OS Usage` up to the value of `Current cores`.

`Steal cores` - The value of CPU share that the virtual machine was waiting to access physical resources due to competition with other VMs (“noisy neighbors”).
panels.title: CPU Core usage

panels.description:
`Current cores` - The amount of computing resources allocated to a virtual machine.

`Current cores guaranteed` - The minimum amount of resources (in fractions of CPUs) guaranteed to be available to the VM. Calculated as `Current cores` × `Reservation`.

`Configured cores` - The amount of computing resources configured in the virtual machine which will be aplied after VM restart.

`Configured cores guaranteed` - The minimum amount of resources (in CPU fractions) guaranteed to be available to the VM that will be available after the configuration is applied.

`Demand cores` - The number of CPU shares by which it is recommended to increase `Current cores` based on the current load

targets.expr:
sum without (pod) (
  max(kube_controller_pod{namespace="$namespace", controller=~"InternalVirtualizationVirtualMachineInstance/${name}", pod=~"virt-launcher-${name}.*"}) by(pod)
  * on (pod)
  sum by (pod) (
    (
      sum by(namespace, pod, container) (rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{namespace="$namespace", pod=~"virt-launcher-${name}.*"}[$__rate_interval]))
      -
      sum by(namespace, pod, container) (avg_over_time(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="cpu",unit="core", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"virt-launcher-${name}.*", container!="POD"}[$__rate_interval]))
    )
    or
    sum by(namespace, pod, container) (rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{namespace="$namespace", pod=~"virt-launcher-${name}.*"}[$__rate_interval]))
  )
) > 0

panels.title: CPU Cores

panels.description:
`Current cores` - The amount of computing resources allocated to the virtual machine.

`Guaranteed cores` - The minimum amount of resources (in fractions of CPUs) guaranteed to be available to the VM. Calculated as `Current cores` × `Reservation`

`Hypervisor overhead` - The value of the fraction of CPU used by the hypervisor.

`OS Usage` - The level of utilization of allocated compute resources of the guest OS. If `Reservation < 100%`, it is allowed to exceed `OS Usage` up to the value of `Current cores`.

`Steal cores` - The value of CPU share that the virtual machine was waiting to access physical resources due to competition with other VMs (“noisy neighbors”).
panels.title: CPU usage per core

    rate(d8_virtualization_virtualmachine_block_device_read_times_seconds_total{namespace="$namespace", name="$name", type!="cloudinit"}[$__rate_interval])
    /
    rate(d8_virtualization_virtualmachine_block_device_iops_read_total{namespace="$namespace", name="$name", type!="cloudinit"}[$__rate_interval])
)
